sentences.sContent: The salesman proclaimed that his tonic would cure all diseases.
sentences.sContent_eng: The salesman proclaimed that his tonic would cure all diseases.
sentences.sCn: 推销员宣称他的滋补品将治愈所有的病。

synos.tran: 滋补的；声调的；使精神振作的

phrases.pCn: 琴酒补剂；杜松子酒补剂

words.tran: 年久变色的；有声调的，具有……音质的
沉闷的；单调的；缺乏声调的；无声的
强壮；肌肉弹性；紧张性；调位强度

trans.tranOther: a drink that you have as a medicine to give you more energy or strength when you feel tired
